        public java.util.List<Bid> getUserBids​(int userId)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get all of the bids by a user and search by user id.
        Parameters:
        userId - User's id that wanted to get the bids.
        Returns:
        Return a list of bids by the user id.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • insertBid

        public int insertBid​(Bid bid,
                     Auction auction)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Place new bid into the database.
        Parameters:
        bid - New bid information that the user has placed.
        auction - Auction that user wanted to bid.
        Returns:
        Return any integer except 0 if insert successfully, if not it will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

      • deleteBid

        public int deleteBid​(Bid bid)
              throws java.sql.SQLException
        Delete a bid from the database.
        Parameters:
        bid - The bid that is wanted to be removed from the database.
        Returns:
        Return any integer except 0 if delete successfully, if not it will return 0.
